## L1T O2O tags in Run II

Following O2O tags need to be added to the data Global Tags for DQM:

*** =left

System     |   Payload[Tag Suffix]
-----------|-----------------
uGT        | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TUtmTriggerMenu[<span style="font-weight:bold">_Stage2v0_hlt</span>]</span>
uGT RS     | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TGlobalPrescalesVetos[<span style="font-weight:bold">_Stage2v0_hlt</span>]</span>
CALOL{1,2} | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TCaloParams[<span style="font-weight:bold">_Stage2v<span style="color:red">1</span>_hlt</span>]</span>
uGMT       | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TMuonGlobalParams[<span style="font-weight:bold">_Stage2v0_hlt</span>]</span>

*** =right

System     |   Payload[Tag Suffix]
-----------|-----------------
BMTF       | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TMuonBarrelParams[<span style="font-weight:bold">_Stage2v0_hlt</span>]</span>
OMTF       | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TMuonOverlapParams[<span style="font-weight:bold">_Stage2v0_hlt</span>]</span>
EMTF       | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TMuonEndCapParams[<span style="font-weight:bold">_Stage2v0_hlt</span>]</span>
O2O        | <span style="font-family:helvetica;color:blue">L1TriggerKey(List)[<span style="font-weight:bold">_Stage2v0_hlt</span>]</span>

*** =fullwidth

New&nbsp;<span style="font-family:helvetica;color:green">L1TMuonEndCapForests[<span style="font-weight:bold">_Stage2v0_hlt</span>]</span> will be used with new EMTF emulator (in progress)

* History for these tags was reconstructed starting ~June 2016 (e.g. [last report](http://kkotov.github.io/l1o2o/talks/2017.03.20) for CaloParams)

* Validation (data-emulator comparison) was ran on a Heavy Ion run ([muons](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-3), [calo](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-4))

* Future Monte Carlo tags will be generated from these O2O tags and used in MC campaigns

---  &twocol

## Summary

We close the chapter on L1T configuration in 2016; TSG is welcome to use tags within a data GTs

DQM needs a data GT for the real-time trigger validation with L1T emulators
